entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
